CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence | customer managed storage
CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence | customer managed storage
OldVersion.description: In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: Update: Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
OldVersion.description: Update: Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
CurrentVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow ups to keep the conversation going. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or asking what a particular person said during the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
OldVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow ups to keep the conversation going. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or asking what a particular person said during the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage question post update
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage is updating its questions to include two parts: a required field for the main question and an optional larger field for extra details.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage question post update
OldVersion.description: Viva Engage is updating its questions to include two parts: a required field for the main question and an optional larger field for extra details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Code Snippets in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
Users will be able to add code snippets to their posts, discussions, replies, questions, polls, and praises on Viva Engage. 

Additionally, if customers are licensed for Answers in Viva Engage, this feature will also be available when asking questions on Answers.

To add code snippets, locate the new </> button on the publisher toolbar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Code Snippets in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to add code snippets to their posts, discussions, replies, questions, polls, and praises on Viva Engage. 

Additionally, if customers are licensed for Answers in Viva Engage, this feature will also be available when asking questions on Answers.

To add code snippets, locate the new </> button on the publisher toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
OldVersion.description: Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
OldVersion.description: Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
OldVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub - Prompts and responses
CurrentVersion.description: Within Microsoft Purview AI Hub, prompts and responses will appear for AI interaction events.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub - Prompts and responses
OldVersion.description: Within Microsoft Purview AI Hub, prompts and responses will appear for AI interaction events.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Additional formatting options in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: In response to feedback from you, our customers, we are adding support for even more formatting options when composing in Outlook for iOS or Android! You will be able to choose font size and color, set a default font, as well as clearing and painting formatting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Additional formatting options in Outlook for iOS and Android
OldVersion.description: In response to feedback from you, our customers, we are adding support for even more formatting options when composing in Outlook for iOS or Android! You will be able to choose font size and color, set a default font, as well as clearing and painting formatting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI Hub - UX enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: The UX for Microsoft Purview AI Hub will have enhancements so that more recommendations can be displayed and triaged.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI Hub - UX enhancements
OldVersion.description: The UX for Microsoft Purview AI Hub will have enhancements so that more recommendations can be displayed and triaged.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
CurrentVersion.description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
OldVersion.description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
OldVersion.description: Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
CurrentVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
OldVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - User-level mute
CurrentVersion.description: The mute user feature will allow users to remove other users' posts from their feeds and digests. Users cannot mute designated leaders. Muting a user does not block notifications or at-mentions from that user. Admins can turn this feature on or off for the entire network.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - User-level mute
OldVersion.description: The mute user feature will allow users to remove other users' posts from their feeds and digests. Users cannot mute designated leaders. Muting a user does not block notifications or at-mentions from that user. Admins can turn this feature on or off for the entire network.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
CurrentVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
OldVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Recommended comments
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage will offer a new way to see contributions from close contacts and leaders within conversation threads. In the home feed and More for You feed, users see two comments that are meaningful to them and the overall conversation. Users can see the rest of the conversation with one click. There are no changes to the comment, reply, or reaction experiences with this new feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Recommended comments
OldVersion.description: Viva Engage will offer a new way to see contributions from close contacts and leaders within conversation threads. In the home feed and More for You feed, users see two comments that are meaningful to them and the overall conversation. Users can see the rest of the conversation with one click. There are no changes to the comment, reply, or reaction experiences with this new feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
OldVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Scoping changes in Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive for Business will soon support user accounts and groups as part of the policy scoping location picker.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Scoping changes in Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive
OldVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive for Business will soon support user accounts and groups as part of the policy scoping location picker.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
CurrentVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
OldVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authentication on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
OldVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authentication. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authentication’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the default policy for Transcription from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants
OldVersion.description: We are updating the default policy for Transcription from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
CurrentVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
OldVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
OldVersion.description: You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: ?Data Security Posture Management for AI?
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications pane batching
CurrentVersion.description: Batches are groups of cards in the user's Notification pane separated by subject. Items from the same email thread, document, sheet, etc. will be grouped into a single batch. #newouotlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications pane batching
OldVersion.description: Batches are groups of cards in the user's Notification pane separated by subject. Items from the same email thread, document, sheet, etc. will be grouped into a single batch. #newouotlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
CurrentVersion.description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
CurrentVersion.description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read Aloud support added to Copilot chat responses
CurrentVersion.description: Read Aloud capability lets you listen to Copilot responses in the chat pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
CurrentVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross Cloud collaboration in VDI
CurrentVersion.description: VDI users can join meetings with people in other Microsoft 365 cloud environments (e.g., a user in GCCH joining a meeting in commercial, GCC or DOD) through three options: authenticated access via cross-cloud meeting connection, authenticated access using a guest account, or anonymous access. These scenarios require Slimcore-based optimization, as WebRTC-based optimization does not support meetings across different cloud environments.

CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive for Business will soon support user accounts and groups as part of the policy scoping location picker.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
CurrentVersion.description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the default policy for Transcription from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
CurrentVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
CurrentVersion.description: You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications pane batching
CurrentVersion.description: Batches are groups of cards in the user's Notification pane separated by subject. Items from the same email thread, document, sheet, etc. will be grouped into a single batch. #newouotlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
CurrentVersion.description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
CurrentVersion.description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read Aloud support added to Copilot chat responses
CurrentVersion.description: Read Aloud capability lets you listen to Copilot responses in the chat pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
CurrentVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross Cloud collaboration in VDI
CurrentVersion.description: VDI users can join meetings with people in other Microsoft 365 cloud environments (e.g., a user in GCCH joining a meeting in commercial, GCC or DOD) through three options: authenticated access via cross-cloud meeting connection, authenticated access using a guest account, or anonymous access. These scenarios require Slimcore-based optimization, as WebRTC-based optimization does not support meetings across different cloud environments.
